<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Furious Finish](/Feats.aspx?ID=5814) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=813" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=680" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 77 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

Desperate to finish the fight, you pour all your rage into one final blow. Make a Strike. If it hits, you gain a circumstance bonus to damage equal to the number of rounds remaining in your Rage (maximum 10). After this Strike, your [Rage](/Actions.aspx?ID=2802) immediately ends, and you are [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=73) until you rest for at least 10 minutes.
name: Furious Finish
